page.title: 03LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: {STURMINSTER NEWTON }In Sturminster Newton,the houses are mostly old,being made of brick or stone with thatched or tiled roofs.The old buildings, including the Swan Hotel and the White Hart Inn,are compared with the harsh red brick houses of the local newer houses,called "Rixon". {HINTON ST.MARY }In Hinton,the old houses have stone walls,thatched roofs and twisted roses around the doors,set in beautiful gardens.There are also some newer houses. {PLANS FOR THE FUTURE}A proposed plan has been put forward to enlarge Sturminster.This will include building 300_500 new houses before 1996,new shops,and a roundabout.This will bring in about 3040 new persons by 1995.How_ ever,many local people opose this plan,as there are many listed buildings in this Dorset town.
